Text: Thanks very much for this.  I completely understand about the weather since I have the same problem here in Thailand with the heavy rain and satellite reception.
thx for the effort anyway dude ;)

Just started watching, glad you got this up so quick, I fell asleep and missed most of the race.  I have only watched the first 45mins so far, but great quality, both vid and audio, Thanks for the upload

Much thanks again jameshotwire!  Good cuts too, until I looked at the laps I hadn't realized there was an edit.   

And again another great race, great season so far
